We're sorry to read of your recent experience and would love to discuss this further. Please be sure to give us a call at our Guest Education Centre on 1.877.263.9300 or you can always start a Live Chat with us on our website. We look forward to hearing from you.

reviewText: These were the perfect length for my husband who is 6’3. He like shorts that are short and these are short but also appropriate to wear in public. They fit perfectly and look great!
My favorite out of all the shorts I have purchased. Fits perfect and ideal for running and lifting
I love that these are great shorts for exercising, and also very comfortable to hangout and relax in.

I wear lululemon more than any other brand, and I can say that these shorts are my favorite. While they don’t have a liner, they have a comfortable waste band and fit very well. Along with this, they look good going to either the gym, out on a date, or just relaxing at home. Would definitely recommend purchasing.

reviewTitle: Functional, great pockets, but not durable
reviewText: I like the fabric of the shorts overall. It wicks away sweat well and dries quickly. The pockets are beyond great. Both side pockets have a handy zipper that safely keep items inside and at reach. My only complaint is that the mesh on the inseam is made of inferior material. After only 4 washes, already seeing wear and tear and unraveling at the seam.
responseText:
Hey Rtgroup,

Thanks for taking the time to share your feedback with us. I'm sorry to hear your Switch Up Short 6" is experiencing some inseam issues. Keep an eye out for an email coming your way. Chat Soon!

userLocation: RESIDE AND TEACH IN LA. FROM PA
reviewText: When I find a piece of gear I really like I buy in multiples. I had a couple of pairs of lulu shorts with the brief liners. Recently lulu switched to boxer liners (with the legs) which I HATE. So in terms of lulu shorts, Ive switched to linerless. These are the next best thing to what I had. Nice comfortable fit. Nice material. Moves well in yoga. Nice cut on the legs. And bonus, zippered pockets!
These are comfy without sacrificing the style!

Have to say this might be a new worst, Took the shorts out of the bag brand new and they all-ready have loose threads.(i expect a lot more from a $75 pair of shorts) The new mens line just is not holding up the way it used to.
responseText:
Dear Ralph,

Thank you for taking the time to share your feedback with us. I'm sorry to hear that your Switch Up Short *6" is not performing for you! Keep an eye out for an email coming your way. Chat soon!

reviewText: I got a pair of these shorts at a lululemon event, i ended up ordering three more pairs. The length of these shorts are perfect, at 5 11' they sit a good length above the knee. the pockets on these shorts are also amazing. I have an iphone 8+ and fits well in the pockets with my wallet and keys if I'm wearing these shorts outside the gym. You wont be disappointed

I love the design of these shorts and the addition of three pockets is awesome. However, the bonded seams don't wear very well, as over time they loose their shape and become warped. Causing the shorts to look awful. Would recommend staying away from these.

reviewTitle: Best pair of shorts Lululemon has made
reviewText:
I had to replace my surge 7" short because the zipper broke. However, I do not like the new style of surge shorts with the zippered pocket at the back which led me to these.
These are the perfect size, perfect fit. I love the two zippered pockets on the sides and the hidden back pocket as well.

product: Metal Vent Tech Short Sleeve V
reviewText: I ordered this after trying on at the store ( since they didn't have size Med. in stock) and by far this metal vent shirt os my favorite of all. I like the material and the style! I'd buy this again!!

product: Metal Vent Tech Short Sleeve V
reviewText: This shirt breaths great has a nice drape and vivid full saturation of color. Have a couple in two shades of blue.

product: Metal Vent Tech Short Sleeve V
reviewText: I love these series whether they're in classic or surge. The fabric is great and wicks sweat effectively. Very breathable, even in Bikram, when typically it's just easier and more comfortable to be shirtless. The cut is great and snug if you have that upside down V shape, though the sleeves could stand to be tighter around the bicep. V neck was a nice detail to add. Highly recommended!!

product: Metal Vent Tech Short Sleeve V
reviewText: Very breathable and light. Perfect shirt to wear for a workout or out on a warm day. I consider the metal vent tech line essential for a minimalist wardrobe. It’s a versatile fabric and style.

product: Metal Vent Tech Short Sleeve V
reviewText: Very comfortable and stylish. Not a huge V-Neck fan but this shirt really changed my opinion. Very soft material and very good quality. Was a steal to get on clearance

product: Metal Vent Tech Short Sleeve V
userLocation: BORN IN HONOLULU, RETIRED IN ARLINGTON.
reviewText: Very flattering on even an ordinary male physique. I’m convinced it looks so much nicer than a plain Lulu metal vent T-shirt, especially if you don’t have time to change out of it after class or workout. I sweat in yoga class - this current line of the Vs with the fabric cleverly vented in the torso area is sheer genius.

product: Metal Vent Tech Short Sleeve V
reviewText: Purchased for my BF to wear to yoga classes and he absolutely loves these (in both navy and slate/white). Looks great on him as well. Runs true to size.

product: Metal Vent Tech Short Sleeve V
reviewText: All the Metal Vent Tees have a great fit. This one is super soft with a nice V-Neck. Same great fit and comfort. I'm 5'8" 168lbs and wear a Med. You want this to fit snug

product: Metal Vent Tech Short Sleeve V
reviewText:
I was happy for receiving my shirts.
I got my shirts yesterday.
I wore one shirt just for 1 hour driving.
When I came back to home I took off my shirt then I saw already begun to pill.
This has been a very disappointing purchase.
This shirt may be the single most disappointing thing that Lulu has ever made
I bought this shirt because it fit well and I loved the feel. I have been shopping at lululemon for 3 years now but this shirt is one of terrible quality.
responseText:
Hi john12,

Thank you for taking the time to share your feedback with us. We are sorry to hear that your Metal Vent Tech Short Sleeve has not performed for you, and we would love to help. Keep an eye out for an email coming your way. Chat soon!

product: Metal Vent Tech Short Sleeve V
reviewText: Running around daily with my Phys. Ed. classes this shirt always keeps me dry and it NEVER EVER seems to smell from odor. I have 4 different styles and colors and look at adding to the collection. Highly recommend /

product: Metal Vent Tech Short Sleeve V
reviewText: I bought this shirt because it fit well and I loved the feel. I have been shopping at lululemon for years now but this shirt is wrinkled after the first wash and has no stretched and the fit is no longer desirable. Not good.
responseText:
Hey Krnroo,
No one likes a stretched out shirt. That's definitely a thumbs down from us. We've sent through an email so we can learn more about your experience and look into some options.

product: Metal Vent Tech Short Sleeve V
reviewTitle: Good shirt. However ripped shortly after purchase
reviewText: When I first got this product (different color, however same shirt) I had ordered two, but in different colors. One of them is one of my favorite shirts to wear. They are light, comfortable, stylish, and all around a great shirt. Unfortunately, one of the shirts threads started to tear and rip. It left a good size hole (fingers width in diameter) right in the middle of my shirt leaving me 60 bucks down the drain and one useless shirt hanging in my closet. Very unfortunate. However, the other shirt is holding up just fine. I don't know why one of the shirts ripped, because I used both shirts to only wear around town and kept great care of both.
responseText:
Hi there Takoda,
I'm sorry to hear of your experience with the ripped seam and hole on your shirt. I'd like to speak further with you, so look for an email headed your way.

product: Metal Vent Tech Short Sleeve V
reviewText: Absolutely love lulu. Been wearing their clothes for 4+ years. I have several metal vent tech tees (x4), and I'm usually a M. This medium is so tight around my chest (more so than the previous medium generation metal tech vent shirts) and the length is shorter. It appears that lulu is cutting costs by making the tee shorter and the quality feels off (this is also true with the current generation metal vent hoodies compared to previous metal vent hoodies). My other metal vent tech feel very high-quality--when I rub the fabric between my fingers, they feel great. This one feels sheer and without "substance"--or the regular high quality that lulu USED to deliver.

product: Metal Vent Tech Short Sleeve V
reviewTitle: Was the best shirt until it started to pill
reviewText: This was my go to shirt. The material was great for wicking sweat during intense interval training. The feel was great and no chafing or restriction of movement. I love the V-neck and wish the shirt was still in production. However, this all changed after a few months - I started to notice pills on the surface of the shirt. I keep strictly to the wash and drying instructions as I want nice quality clothes to last forever. The shirt has always been washed on cold/gentle and always line dried. I always separate out laundry into all workout clothes which 90% are Lulu. Now that the shirt has started to pill, Im very disappointed and second guessing the fabric. Just hate that in less than 6 months and 15 washes the shirt hasn't lasted as long as all the other clothes I wear. - Metal vent tanks etc are lasting wonderfully - also worn and washed once weekly in the rotation.
responseText:
Hey Kettlebell,
Thanks for leaving your feedback on your Metal Vent Tech Short Sleeve V. We stand behind the quality of our gear and would like to work towards a fix for the pilling you're experiencing. Keep an eye out for an email headed your way.
Chat soon!

product: Metal Vent Tech Short Sleeve V
reviewTitle: Top Notch Workout Shirt for Men
reviewText: The Metal Vent V and Crew are excellent work out shirts! My husband and father in law LOVE the V neck and my dad and brother in law love the crew necks. Every time a new and nice color comes out, I buy them for my husband and dad because they are their favorite shirts to exercise in (running, tennis, hiking, etc). All the men in my life were reluctant to try Lulu, but it was love at first wear! Please make more colors and make them in the ORIGINAL $64 shirts. I have no idea why the sudden mark up to $68 - that's ridiculous!!

product: Metal Vent Tech Short Sleeve V
reviewText: I have had this shirt for a few days and during workouts and casual wear the shirt is the best I have ever owned. But after my 3rd workout i noted that a lot of the threads in the shoulder are starting to pull and for this much money I would expect that a shirt like this could withstand a few workouts before the threads showed this much wear to them already.

product: Metal Vent Tech Short Sleeve V
reviewTitle: These are great... why haven't they made more???
reviewText: These are great shirts, however, they have only released a few colors this spring/summer. Why the lack of choices when the regular necked version has had a whole bunch of colors...?

product: Metal Vent Tech Short Sleeve V
reviewText: These shirts are my go to when it's hot outside (especially here in AZ). They are extremely comfortable and keep you dry during the hot summer months and intense workouts. Very soft material that is a bit delicate, you really have to be careful not to snag it on anything and wash it with other like materials. You can get some pulls here and there which really annoys me, but I think I have it down now and that hasn't happened in a while. I have quite a few of these and they're great for working out or just casual wear day-to-day. If the material didn't snag so easy I'd give them 5 stars. Overall very good!

product: Metal Vent Tech Short Sleeve V
reviewTitle: Versatile top, great for working out and lounging
reviewText: Just picked up this shirt at the FI Lulu store and threw it on for lunch prior to going on a 5 mile run down Crystal Cove beach...great run, great shirt. Breathable, comfortable. I can't wait until the local FI store has more colors!

product: Metal Vent Tech Short Sleeve V
reviewText: First of all I love LULU. I have sweatshirts, jackets, long sleeve shirts, and 4 of these Vent Tech Shirts, and my wife, well she had a ridiculous amount of product, and we love it!!
responseText:
Hi SheaS,
We really appreciate you taking the time to share your feedback regarding our gear. I want you to know that we do stand behind the quality of our gear, we will take it back for you. Please drop by your local store for a resolution or, give us a call at the GEC, 1.877.263.9300, and we can chat about your options for a return.

product: Metal Vent Tech Short Sleeve V
reviewText: I don't know its either I have a big chest or this shirt is just a little tight on that area. Overall though, its really a great shirt!

product: Metal Vent Tech Short Sleeve V
likes: no need to wash after every workout
dislikes: way too loose for me especially towrds the bottom
reviewText: Made a mistake in leaving it in the wash overnight - color ran a bit.
responseText:
Hey there Iq4425,
I'm sorry to hear of your experience with the Metal Vent Tech Short Sleeve. Know that this should not have happened with the colour and we'll definitely take it back to get you into a shirt that will perform better for you. I think you'll find the Silverescent technology helps with any sort of post-sweat smell, and we'd love for you to get full use out of your gear. Stay tuned for an email coming your way about this.

product: Metal Vent Tech Short Sleeve V
reviewText: I first bought this shirt 3 months ago and I loved it so I got a second one. I always hang dry my clothes because I find it preserves them longer. But I threw both my metal vent t's in the dryer and they both shrunk. I thought that everything was supposed to be pre-shrunk? Pretty disappointed. If it weren't for the fact that they shrunk it would be fives stars for sure!
responseText:
Hi Antho101,

All of our gear is pre-shrunk, so this should not have happened with your shirt. I have sent you an email to outline suggestions for resolving this.

product: Metal Vent Tech Short Sleeve V
reviewTitle: My favorite from the anti-stink collection
reviewText: Awesome v-neck workout shirt. Unlike some of the other men's shirts, this one is the perfect fit for a small in terms of length and sleeve cut. Also enjoy the v which provides a little freedom when doing certain exercises. Shirt goes well with pace breakers. Also digging the contrast stitch design. Very happy!

product: Metal Vent Tech Short Sleeve V
reviewText: I bought this t short for my husband and it ripped the first time he tried to wear it. There is a small hole on the sleeve, it's completely unwearable. For the price, I expect more.
responseText:
Hi madymaya,
I'm sorry to hear this happened to your husbands shirt, and know this isn't the experience we want to leave him with. Take this into your local store, or give us a ring so we can work on a resolution together. 1.877.263.9300

product: Metal Vent Tech Short Sleeve V
dislikes: did not keep cool during workout, did not dry in a decent amount of time, price too high for the quality recieved
reviewTitle: soaked after yoga class with no drying in sight
reviewText: My wife has been buying lululemon products for a long time and decided to buy me some clothes from the new lululemon store at the Walden Galleria Mall in Cheektowaga, NY for fathers day ( a shirt and shorts) so that I could wear them to an upcoming yoga event she wanted me to go to. At first I thought it was a lot of money (over $120) for a pair of shorts and shirt but I figured if it kept me comfortable and semi-dry during a workout it would be worth it. After doing a Baptiste yoga class with my new lululemon gear I was very upset with how the clothes performed. I do admit the shorts worked out pretty nicely and were almost completely dry like I would have expected after the class ended. The ($64) shirt was awful. Not only was I soaked after the workout (it did not keep my cool during yoga) I had to hang around the yoga studio for a party afterwards with some of the yogis outside. It was a brisk night when I walked outside and for over an hour the shirt just would not dry. I was freezing! For the price we pay for your clothes I expect quality. I have clothes from Old Navy that are a fraction of the price that performed better than this. If I could I would return at least the shirt in a heartbeat but I understand that isnt possible after wearing it. I would really appreciate some feedback and let me know if this is the quality I should expect if I buy any more clothes.
responseText:
Hi kubes9236,
Thank you so much for your review. We want you to feel good in the gear you're in and have it perform as intended. If you're able to swing into your local store and let them know what's happening with your shirt, they'd be able to make it right for you.

product: Metal Vent Tech Short Sleeve V
reviewText: I currently own three of these shirts. They are the most comfortable shirts I've ever worn. They're perfect for lounging around the house and perform even better at the gym. I hope to see heathered cove in the colour selection in the future!

product: Metal Vent Tech Short Sleeve V
reviewText: The fit on these shirts is fantastic, very trim and body contoured. The V-neck is just right, not too loose and saggy when it gets sweaty. Very soft fabric with a nice texture and construction. I want one in every color now!

product: Metal Vent Tech Short Sleeve V
likes: vent panels, writing at the bottom, athletic fit, long and roomy
reviewText: I normally dont do posts but these are actually really nice shirts. I originally wasn't that into them but after breaking it in a day, I have to say that they are one of the most comfortable shirts I've worn. I also like the writing at the bottom of the shirt just because it's quite humorous to see after a workout. Just a little extra touch for an already great shirt. It's a long shirt but yet still not big enough to be baggy

product: Metal Vent Tech Short Sleeve V
reviewTitle: Been waiting a while for this!
reviewText: I love the regular vent tech and the 5-year basic Vs. Thanks for combining the two! I wish this shirt actually came in a REAL black (not just a heather gray version called "black"). Besides that, fits and feels the same as the regular vent techs and the V definitely gives it a cooler look. Another pet peeve of mine is when you guys make the little 3 "lll" logos on the shoulder some bold color thats not the same as the shirt. In my opinion, I think it's tacky and takes away a bit from an otherwise GREAT shirt. I wear it everywhere! gym, class, work. BRING IT IN BLACK! and more colors!
Comfy but still form fitting.

This shirt does not feel like other Rulu shirts I’ve purchased. It’s rough, not soft and stretchy. There was something different in the cut of this shirt. My wife described it as having a more feminine cut. The buttons go down too far down the torso for my taste. I’ll be returning. Please bring back the Surge Henley.

dislikes: not rulu, not soft, not buttery
reviewText: I have been buying Lululemon for nearly 10 years now. This shirt is certainly not RULU. It is not even close to RULU. It lacks the buttery softness that RULU normally has. It feels just like thick cotton to me. Not soft or buttery. I actually found the material sort of scratchy. So please don't call this RULU. Also don't buy it thinking this item is RULU, cause its NOT!

product:
Metal Vent Tech Short Sleeve
Wool
reviewText: Excellent materials and workmanship in this product.

product:
Metal Vent Tech Short Sleeve
Wool
reviewText: I bought a few of these shirts and they've all had some problem or another. One developed a hole in it. The other snagged pretty bad in the laundry (FOLLOWING LULU'S INSTRUCTIONS!!!). This shirt is amazing but it doesn't hold up at all for too long...
responseText:
Hi AlexMinOC,
Thanks for taking the time to share this feedback. I'm sorry to hear about the holes in your gear, that doesn't sound right. I've sent an email your way so we can discuss some solutions.

product:
Metal Vent Tech Short Sleeve
Wool
reviewText: This shirt is awesome, the reason I didn't give it 5 stars was because it started pilling before my first wash. I am not sure if this is because of the wool blend but I was a bit disappointed this happened so early.
responseText:
Hey Cannon,
Thanks for reaching out to us. I'm sorry to hear your shirt has started pilling. I can understand your disappointment and would like to help. Keep an eye out for an email headed your way.

product:
Metal Vent Tech Short Sleeve
Wool
reviewText:
Just got this on sale in a Lulu store. It is perfect it every way but I wish it came in an all black version like the regular metal vent techs. I like this more than the regular ones but the color is a little flashy for everyday wear and looks like an UA pattern.
Also, word on sizing, I ordered a medium Metal Vent Tech on sale from the website and it fit like a large in this shirt from the store. Glad I bought it in store or I would have had to exchange it.

reviewTitle: Tag no longer at the back
reviewText: I do NOT like the new Lululemon logo - not specially having it at the bottom of the shirts. I miss having it at the back.
This is what you pay Lulu for, technical fabrics implemented in impeccable designs and produced with expert manufacturing.

The design is great and fabric feels nice against the skin. However because the fabric is overly synthetic; do not iron, hot wash, heat in anyway. As the design will peal and separate. I ruined my shirt by fluke-accident and re-bought it in long sleeves in multiple colors. I like the deep sea teal color the most. I would never wear this on a plane while traveling, for the same reason like nylon stockings; you shouldn't wear when flying. I don't think they should discontinue the shirt, because I would like to re-buy them in other colors.

likes: details of the reflective pattern, fit
reviewTitle: Great shirt, as long as you don’t sweat
reviewText: As many others have reviewed this shirt have said, the shirt fits great and feels good on. That’s all fine as long as it’s dry. When it gets wet, it clings to you like Saran Wrap and takes forever to dry. For the price it’s not worth it which is a bummer because I really wanted to like this shirt more, but as a frequent traveler I won’t even take this with me because after a good workout I can’t dry this out in time to pack away.
responseText:
Hey RyanJD,
We're sorry to read of your experience with the Runway Short Sleeve and would love to discuss this further. Please be sure to give us a call at our Guest Education Centre on 1.877.263.9300 or you can always start a Live Chat with us on our website. We look forward to hearing from you.

reviewText: Versatile, lightweight and breathes. Love this shirt.
Shirt looks great. That's about it. Went running wearing it and it did not do a good job wicking sweat. I bought 2 colors, red and blue so I will just use them as cool casual shirts.
responseText:
Hey DarthGman,

Thank you for taking the time to review the Runway Short Sleeve. That doesn't sound right! Please feel free to give our GEC a call or SMS us at 1.877.263.9300 to continue this conversation.

dislikes: fit, wrinkles, does not wick sweat, sticks to the body
reviewText: This Shirt is not the quality shirt I have come to expect. If this was my first lululemon shirt I would not buy the brand again. I have a little over half dozen metal vent tech shirts and this does not preform anywhere close to those. The fit is awkward, the seams and collar wrinkle and bunch up after one wash. (cold wash, hang dry) While working out the shirt becomes really heavy and sticks to the body. I really like the reflective detail on the back of the shirt which is why i bought it but i no longer wear it because it looks so wrinkled and preforms so badly.
responseText:
Hey smith93,

Thanks for taking the time to share your experience with us! We definitely want all of your gear to perform for you, and we're sorry to hear that the Runway Short Sleeve missed the mark. Stay tuned for an email coming your way - we'd love to turn this around!

reviewText: While the aesthetics of this shirt are unique and cool, it doesn't perform well at all. If you're going for a light jog, you'll probably be fine, but if you do anything more, I'd buy something else. Once you start to sweat, the shirt immediately begins to stick to your body. As you continue to sweat, the shirt gets more and more wet and suctions itself to you. On top of that, it takes forever to dry. I've hung it up and left it for 12 hours, expecting it to by dry, only to find that it was still very damp. Spend your money on something else.
responseText:
Hey DannyH,

Thanks for reaching out and providing this feedback for us. We stand behind the quality of our product, and we want to ensure that you're in gear that is performing well for you. I hear that this is not the case and would like to work with you to create a resolution. Please keep an eye on your inbox as I'll be reaching out shortly to connect.
